page.title: 09Belford Carnival.
page.content: Belford Carnival has been revived this year after a gap of 32 years.It was originally held in 1952 and 1953 but was then only a weekend celebration. This year it will be held from July 7th_14th,commencing with the crowning of the Carnival Princess and ending with a parade of floats through the village.A great variety of events have been planned,the aim being to cater for all tastes and interests.They include Knock_out cricket,a bike ride, and a pony event;Country and Western music,pipe music and a Victorian Soiree,with a Mad_Hatter's Tea_Party, Fancy Dress disco and a Teddy Bear's Picnic for the children.Displays in shop windows along the theme of fairy tales and bygone days,plus bunting strung across the street and floral displays on the pavements,help to enhance the carnival atmosphere.
